name: unmilled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of grain, seeds, etc.) that has not been crushed into flour or powder: They collected the grains of unmilled rice that had fallen on the floor. The highest concentrations of magnesium are found in whole seeds such as legumes, nuts, and unmilled grains. Related word
mill verb
More examplesFewer examplesThe prices in the export market for unmilled cereals have shot up.In Germany, they traditionally add unmilled barley malt to give the beer its distinctive taste.Grains that are unmilled and contain the whole grain, including oatmeal and brown rice, are better for you than milled grains.
